title: Snowdown not there
body: im trying to get a skin as i just got rp, but my snowdown sale shop is not appearing, how do i fix this??

replies.body: It's a bug and wasn't intended (it's supposed to be open til the 7th). They are looking into it.

Hey ShadowBanshee86,

Your Snowdown Shop should be back up! Can you confirm whether it's there for you?
